field.path_desc: Describe the path from loading area to install location
field.stairs_required: Are stairs required on the path?
field.stairs_count: How many stairs on the path?
field.has_ethernet: Is Ethernet available at the install location?
field.days_prior: How many days prior to installation can the safe be delivered?
field.storage_space: Is there space to store the safe?
field.use_dolly: Can a dolly be used to move the equipment?
field.staircase_notes: Describe door sizes, staircases (steps, turns, landings), etc.
field.room_size: Room size (Length x Width x Height)
field.sufficient_space: Is there sufficient space for the safe? (Need 30 inches height)
field.other_safe: Is there another safe in the same room?
field.network: Is there a network connection available?
field.network_distance: If yes, how far from the install location?
field.water_distance: Is the safe being installed 6 feet away from water?
field.power: Is there a power outlet within 4 feet of the unit?
field.install_notes: Describe the installation and include any notes
